content: Lifestyle General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 21 May 2019Rumors about Huawei is everywhere. How likely will it affect the existing user who owns a Huawei smartphone?1) Should existing user still hold on to Huawei smartphone or sell it off?2) What type of security vulnerability the existing user will be facing?3) How likely Huawei will come up with the security patches?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Fan ZDLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 23 May 2019I honestly think that most people get phones mostly for their function rather than as an investment. So existing users won't really be affected much in the near term other than perhaps a drop in trade-in value. Long term wise also dont think it'll be an issue. The Android ecosystem is pretty robust, lots of choices to select from.0 comments0
Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 22 May 2019At most just change phone brand. There are so many android phones around, easy to port over.0 comments0
